This is to test the new theme and see whether plots are properly rendered.


```{r remedy001}
library(tidyverse, quietly = T)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_boxplot(aes(x=as.factor(cyl),
                   y=mpg))+
  hrbrthemes::theme_ft_rc()
  
```
